questions.text: What is the first name of Veronica's father?
questions.explanation:
Hiram.

	In a four part comic featuring Veronica called "Veronica in Rome" (issue number 108) is when Mr. Lodge's friends talk Mr. Lodge into sending Veronica into a business school in Rome. Veronica catches the wrong taxi and at her wrong school their are troublemaker girls. The school is actually a type of school with a very bad name - students who go there are said to be thieves.Veronica's roomies dump her in the middle of Rome and a kind family offers to keep Veronica home for one night since it was raining. The next day they send Veronica back to school and the headmistress tells Veronica that "Unauthorized absences are forbidden, Veronica Hodge." "Hodge? I'm not Hodge.It's Lodge. I'm going to tell daddy that this is a reform school. Hello? Operator? Connect me to Mr. Hiram Lodge of Riverdale, U.S.A." This comic book was issued in the year 2002 during October.

questions.text: What is the name of Betty's sister?
questions.explanation:
Polly.

	In a two part comic called "Sisters Are Forever Friends" featuring Betty visiting her sister (issue number 108, "Betty and Veronica Double Digest") her sister is revealed. This comic was issued during October, 2000.

questions.text: What is the name of Veronica's butler?
questions.explanation:
Smithers.

	In "Betty and Veronica Double Digest" issue no 111, there is a comic called "Young at Heart". It's when Betty and Veronica are talking about how stiff Smithers is and then they see him throw a snowball. This was issued in February, 2003.

questions.text: Betty runs a youth group. Her friend, Bob Morgan, runs a youth group at his high school too. Which city does he live in?
questions.explanation:
Southside.

	In a comic called "Movie Romance" (Betty and Veronica Double Digest issue no 104) we find this out. Betty and Veronica are at the movies when Betty runs into Bob. Veronica asks who he is and Betty explains. This was issued during April, 2002.

questions.text: Which of the following has Betty never dated?
questions.explanation:
Moose.

	Betty has never dated Moose, but Moose has dated Veronica. In the "Archie Digest" issue number 196, there is a comic called "She's Sweet Betty Cooper" when Betty is tired of Archie blowing her off for Veronica, so she goes on a date with Reggie. Number 196 was issued in April, 2003.

questions.text: Did Veronica ever buy a magic lamp?
questions.explanation:
yes.

	In the "Betty an Veronica Double Digest", issue number 91, in the comic, "Wish Upon a Star" Veronica bought a magic lamp for two dollars. This comic was issued during October, 2000.

questions.text: Who is the richest girl in Riverdale?
questions.explanation:
Veronica.

	Veronica often wastes her money on clothes, clothes, clothes and more clothes. She also raises the phone bill up. The richest girl in Peembrooke would be Cheryl Blossom.

questions.text: Who is the richest boy in Riverdale?
questions.explanation:
Reggie.

	Reggie never lets anyone forget that. He is always trying to date Veronica, and Veronica uses him as a threat to Archie. The richest boy in Peembrooke is Jason Blossom.
